named-query.name: MarketingTargetFilter.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM MarketingTargetFilter f ORDER BY f.id

named-query.name: MarketingTargetFilter.findByMarketingTargetId
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM MarketingTargetFilter f WHERE f.marketingTargetId = :marketingTargetId ORDER BY f.id

named-query.name: MarketingTargetFilter.existsByFilterName
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(f) FROM MarketingTargetFilter f WHERE f.filterName = :filterName

named-query.name: MarketingTargetFilter.existsByFilterNameAndIdNot
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(f) FROM MarketingTargetFilter f WHERE f.filterName = :filterName AND f.id != :id

named-query.name: MarketingTargetFilterCondition.deleteByFilterId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM MarketingTargetFilterCondition c WHERE c.marketingTargetFilterId = :filterId

named-query.name: MarketingTargetFilterGroup.deleteByFilterId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM MarketingTargetFilterGroup g WHERE g.marketingTargetFilterId = :filterId

named-query.name: MarketingTargetListItem.countByMarketingTargetIdAndSmid
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(m) FROM MarketingTargetListItem m WHERE m.marketingTargetId = :marketingTargetId AND m.smid = :smid
